title: Day Three Highlights - Volcom Pipe Pro 2012
description: NORTH SHORE, Oahu -- (Jan. 31, 2012) -- The third day of competition for the 2012 Volcom Pipe Pro started this morning in absolutely perfect 10-12 foot Pipeline. We awoke to pumping surf that cranked all day long from the same WNW swell that washed out Pi

asset.author: Volcom
asset.hookText:
NORTH SHORE, Oahu -- (Jan. 31, 2012) -- The third day of competition for the 2012 Volcom Pipe Pro started this morning in absolutely perfect 10-12 foot Pipeline. We awoke to pumping surf that cranked all day long from the same WNW swell that washed out Pipeline yesterday.

Today's standouts included three perfect 10-point rides (with a $1,000 cash bonus from Electric's "Perfect 10 Award") given to Balaram Stack (New York), Dusty Payne (Hawaii) and Dylan Graves (Puerto Rico).

- Music - 
Song: "Crossthreaded"
Artist: Premonition 13
Release: Volcom Entertainment Vinyl Club #0020
http://premonition13.com
- Volcom Entertainment -
